byline.original: By NATE SCHWEBER and LISA W. FODERARO

abstract: Dharun Ravi, former roommate of Tyler Clementi, Rutgers University freshman who committed suicide in 2010, pleads guilty to one count of attempted invasion of privacy; had accepted deal with prosecutors to drop original 15 counts against him for using webcam to spy on Clementi while he was having sex with another man.

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Dharun Ravi, a former Rutgers student who used a webcam to spy on Mr. Clementi while he was having sex, accepted a deal with prosecutors to drop all other charges.
snippet: Dharun Ravi, a former Rutgers student who used a webcam to spy on Mr. Clementi while he was having sex, accepted a deal with prosecutors to drop all other charges....

headline.main: Roommate in Tyler Clementi Case Pleads Guilty to Attempted Invasion of Privacy
headline.print_headline: Plea Deal for Ex-Rutgers Student Who Spied on Roommate Before His Death
